attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think there should be thousands of windmills in our sea's. And millions of solar panels on buildings and everywhere conceivable and for the energy obtained to be given to british households for free, i believe this will create more jobs, reduce households use of fossil fuels and reduce the cost of living. think of how much money we waste on bombs and buildings like the millenium dome, i think this would be a beutiful vision for the the future and for freedom. we could be the leaders of this technology and export it, households are one of the biggest co2 emitters.clean energy can be free,the earth will provide

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FusionPower/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
